body:
Welcome to the Official Walls event hosted by Iron and I.


FINALISTS:

armoredpotato + iMucky - Group 1

Zegita + _Downcast - Group 1

Patrikano + iTimeless - Group 2

Lokigh and Nemo - Group 3







SEMIFINAL GAMES


1ST GROUP:
armoredpotato + imucky: 19
Spooks + Falcon: 0
Lokigh + Nemo: 10
Bloodoh + Tomqs: 4


2ND GROUP:
Zegita + _Downcast: 10
Patrikano + iTimeless: 12
Buster_U + Zero9178: 4



Information:
Day of Games: March 26th 1pm EDT for groups 1 and 2


April 2nd - 1pm EDT = Group 3/4 and 3pm EDT = SemiFinals
April 3rd - 3pm EDT = Finals


Teams: 
1: Auratixx and Zaphiz
2: VenemousViper and JustBudah
3: Lokigh and Nemhoe
4: Patrikano and iTimeless
5: Bloodoh and Tomqss
6: Acceqted and BasementDoor
7:  Spookeh and ULTIMATE7FALCON
8: ImRaging and Fouled
9: zero9178 and Buster_U
10: iMucky and armoredpotato
11: Tazz and Jiveh
12: Kyoal and NovaLikesPVP
13: Zeusy and tozl
14: Zegita and _Downcast
15: Zacd56 and Sulorak
16: Lgmatias and FileFish


How this will work:
No Kits allowed.
No Skybases above 25 blocks from the ground.



GROUPINGS:

Group 1:
VenemousViper and JustBudah
Zegita and _Downcast
Zeusy and tozl
iMucky and armoredpotato

Group 2:
Tazz and Jiveh
Spookeh and ULTIMATE7FALCON
Patrikano and iTimeless
NovaLikesPvP and Kyoal

Group 3:
Lokigh and Nemhoe
zero9178 and Buster_U
Fouled and ImRaging
Zaphiz and Auratixx

Group 4:
Tomqss and Bloodoh
Acceqted and BasementDoor
Lgmatias and FileFish
zacd56 and Sulorak

Maps:

How maps will be chosen. In a group, Each team will Be asked to choose a number 1-20 and the team that gets the closest to a randomly generated number gets to pick the map played.

Garden
Tetris Jungle
Tetris Winter
Tetris Swamp
Vanilla
Grotto Arena
Monsterbash




A document regarding all of this will be released tomorrow. This is just for suggestions and anything else that should be added.

There will be 16 teams and 4 brackets/groupings. 4 teams are in each group and they play 5 matches and get points from what place they get. 1st place gets 3, 2nd gets 2, 3rd gets 1, and 4th gets none. Whoever gets the first and second highest amount of points move on.

Each team will have of 2 players consisting of a 2v2v2v2.

The group's first place winner go into group A semi-finals where they play 3 matches for the highest point score. The group's second place winner will go into group B for the same reason. At this point, 8 teams have been eliminated (the teams who got 3rd and 4th for total score).

After that will come the Finals which are the first and second place winners of both group A and B for a final map on Grotto Arena.

From there, the first place duo gets copies of GARY'S MOD off steam. 2nd place gets 2.5k credits, 3rd gets 1k credits, 4th gets 500 credits.

Don't Camp! You should be on surface once walls fall

------

Any questions or suggestions? Leave them down below.


and yes, I'm prepared to get all the hate for having a walls tournament!



CURRENT TEAM SCORES:

Group 1:

Armoredpotato + iMucky: 16 - 1ST PLACE

Zegita + _Downcast: 15 - 2ND PLACE

Tozl + Zeusy: 2 - 4TH PLACE

VenomousViper + JustBudah: 3 - 3RD PLACE



Group 2:

Nova + Kyoal:  5 - 3RD PLACE

Patrikano and iTimeLess: 31 - 1ST PLACE
Jiveh and Tazz: 0 - 4TH PLACE

Spooks and Falcon: 6 - 2ND PLACE


Group 3: Lokigh and Nemhoe: 9 - 1ST PLACE
zero9178 and Buster_U 8 - 2ND PLACE
Fouled and ImRaging - 6 - 3RD PLACE
Zaphiz and Auratixx - 1 - 4TH PLACE
  Group 4:
Tomqss and Bloodoh 10 - 1ST PLACE
Acceqted and BasementDoor - didn't show
Lgmatias and FileFish - didn't show
zacd56 and Sulorak - didn't show

replies.body: Because I can, this is now an official event! By that I mean, this is the first Avicus Walls Event! :D I think we should all give Seth a round of applause for his sentiment to host this. Anyways, try and sign up guys! Let's see if we can work out a prize ;)

After discussing this with Seth, I have decided the award for winning the event will be two copies of Garry's Mod! :D After the victorious pair emerges just hit me up with your Steam accounts and I will be glad to send you (Both) a copy. 

Good luck to all of you! :D

replies.body:
Been Getting a couple of Questions about what happens if a player cannot make it. I can't do anything about your partner but you are allowed to replace your partner if the player comes up to me and tells me a replacement for them. If you get a replacement, The replacement must also msg me that they are replacing you for full confirmation. Once you get replaced, there is no turning back. No Substitutes! Players cannot play if you tell them to sub for you. This means you cannot have someone play on saturday while as you can on sunday. 


skype is sethskye if you want to go more into detail
replies.body_tagged:
Been Getting a couple of Questions about what happens if a player cannot make it. I can't do anything about your partner but you are allowed to replace your partner if the player comes up to me and tells me a replacement for them. If you get a replacement, The replacement must also msg me that they are replacing you for full confirmation. Once you get replaced, there is no turning back. No Substitutes! Players cannot play if you tell them to sub for you. This means you cannot have someone play on saturday while as you can on sunday. 


skype is sethskye if you want to go more into detail

replies.body:
Alright, After getting some complaints about games being this sunday, I have decided to move the games to next Saturday and Sunday!

April 2nd - 1pm EDT = Group 3/4 and 3pm EDT = SemiFinals
April 3rd - 3pm EDT = Finals
